Title: Standard Battle
minimums: At least 3 Units must be any combination of Brawler, Striker, Skirmisher.
reqs: 50% of Units must be Size 3 or more.
effect: Group gains a 6-point Lucky Skill applicable to any Unit in group.

Title: Light Battle
minimums: At least 1 Unit must be a Scout.
reqs: No Unit may be Size 4 or larger.
effect: Group gains a 6-point Lucky Skill applicable to any Unit in group.

Title: Medium Battle
reqs: No Unit may be Size 4 or larger.
effect: Group gains a 6-point Lucky Skill applicable to any Unit in group.

Title: Heavy Battle
minimums: 3 Units must be Size 3 or larger.
effect: Group gains a 6-point Lucky Skill applicable to any Unit in group.
